summary: This bill, the "Unobligated Spending Adjustment to Focus Investment on Relief and Support for Taxpayers Act" (or the USA FIRST Act), proposes transferring unobligated funds from the United States Agency for International Development (USAID) to the Disaster Relief Fund. The funds would be used to carry out the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act, specifically for major disasters declared under the Act. The funds affected are defined as unobligated funds previously appropriated to USAID, as of the date of enactment of this Act.
